General.Name: HiVi Acoustics Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: HiVi Acoustics Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, and sale of electro-acoustic products in China and internationally. It offers Hi-Fi and speaker drivers, home theater speaker systems, active speakers, amplifiers, wifi speakers, headphones, car speakers and amplifiers, pro audio speakers, public address systems, and speaker enclosures, as well as solutions for digital sound reproduction. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou du xi electric co., ltd. HiVi Acoustics Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Xiaokang  Zhang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
